pagination: SELECT COUNT(*) AS numRows FROM student_profile s JOIN student_semester sem ON s.ID = sem.STUDENT_PROFILE_ID WHERE sem.SEMESTER = ? AND sem.SEM_YEAR = ?
SELECT s.* FROM student_profile s JOIN student_semester sem ON s.ID = sem.STUDENT_PROFILE_ID WHERE sem.SEMESTER = ? AND sem.SEM_YEAR = ?
Queires.create: INSERT INTO student_profile (UHID,STUDENT_NAME,SEX,DATE_FORM_SUB,PHOTO_URL,PRESENT_ADDRESS,PHONE_NO,PERMANENT_ADDRESS, FATHER_NAME,FATHER_OCCUPATION, MOTHER_NAME,MOTHER_OCCUPATION,ANNUAL_INCOME,CLAIM_FEE_EXEMPTION,DOB,AADHAR_NO,EMAIL_ID,STUDENT_MOBILE,CATEGORY, CLASS12_BOARD, CLASS12_ROLL,PASSOUT_YEAR) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
Queires.viewID: SELECT * FROM student_profile s LEFT JOIN student_semester p ON s.ID = p.STUDENT_PROFILE_ID WHERE s.ID = ?
Queires.update: UPDATE student_profile SET UHID = ?,STUDENT_NAME = ?,SEX = ?,DATE_FORM_SUB = ?,PHOTO_URL = ?,PRESENT_ADDRESS = ?,PHONE_NO = ?,PERMANENT_ADDRESS = ?, FATHER_NAME = ?,FATHER_OCCUPATION = ?, MOTHER_NAME = ?,MOTHER_OCCUPATION = ?,ANNUAL_INCOME = ?,CLAIM_FEE_EXEMPTION = ?,DOB = ?,AADHAR_NO = ?,EMAIL_ID = ?,STUDENT_MOBILE = ?,CATEGORY = ?,CLASS12_BOARD = ?, CLASS12_ROLL = ?,PASSOUT_YEAR = ? WHERE ID = ?

Queires.UpdateSubject: INSERT INTO student_semester (STUDENT_PROFILE_ID,  SUB_CODE1, SUB_CODE2, SUB_CODE3, SUB_CODE_FC) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE STUDENT_PROFILE_ID = VALUES(STUDENT_PROFILE_ID), SUB_CODE1 = VALUES(SUB_CODE1), SUB_CODE2 = VALUES(SUB_CODE2), SUB_CODE3 = VALUES(SUB_CODE3), SUB_CODE_FC = VALUES(SUB_CODE_FC)

pagination: SELECT count(*) as numRows FROM student_exam_fee
SELECT s.STUDENT_NAME, s.ID, e.PAID,e.PHASE FROM student_profile s, student_exam_fee e WHERE s.ID = e.student_profile_ID
Queires.update: UPDATE student_exam_fee SET PAID = 'YES', PHASE = ? WHERE student_profile_ID = ?
